document_data.mainbody:
Sanbreean was a Red Wizard of Thay in the late 14 century DR.
Sanbreean was struck down battling the War Wizards in the aftermath of the Marsember meeting of the Rightful Conspiracy in early spring of  after they were discovered by the War Wizards, Sanbreean fought them in the docks of the city, only to be slain, as related by Narvo.
